Hey guys this is a peer to peer - it means we share.

If we don't share this damn torrent will die and we will only have 37%. I'm downloading at 2 or 3 KB/s and up loading at 30 !!

When the seed comes on line share the wealth or you and me won't get 100%

Wow!! This is truly amazing, I'm now at 40.5% and have been downloading 24/7 since I started a week ago. Downloaded 2.86 gigs, uploaded 10.9 gigs!!

Out of the 5 leechers on line, no one has more than 41.7% at the mo, but collectively we have 57%. We could do with some sharing people - especially from you Polish downloaders !!!

This sucks..................
wow 50% in 5 hours and now 17 kB/s. can you guys maybe seed for more than an hour at a time...
